testcase.name: Login with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given I naviagate to launch page of the application and click on login link field.passed When User enters the Username riteshranjanmishra938@gmail.com and Password mishra21 into the fields.passed Then user should be abale to succefully Login...............................passed Given I type item in the search box and click on the search button field....passed And I select the particular item and click on the particular item...........passed When I click on the add item to cart field..................................passed And I click on the proceed to checkout field................................passed Then I click on agree term and proceed to checkout field....................passed And I click on the payment field............................................passed Then I click on the confirm my order field..................................passed
